backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles with access control plus predefined brand, appliance, and product maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature metadata, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file mapping frontend file paths to short functional descriptions for documentation.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment config showing required and optional Vite variables for sitemap and verification.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme file defining OKLCH color tokens for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with updated favicon links, metadata, and injected Google verification script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and declaring sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.template.xml: Sitemap template containing SITE_URL placeholder for build-time replacement.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Current sitemap file still containing unreplaced SITE_URL placeholder.
frontend/scripts/generate-sitemap.mjs: Node script generating sitemap.xml from template using VITE_SITE_URL with validation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app showing header with updated v4 logo, contact info, service cards, and booking dialog logic.
frontend/src/components/BookServiceDialo: A form dialog for submitting service requests with validation, state handling, and mutation submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateServiceReque: Mutation hook that sends new service requests to the backend and invalidates the service requests query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, identity persistence, and related state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Query hooks to fetch appliances, brands, and brands filtered by appliance using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including persistence across navigation.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Type definitions for Vite environment variables.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, styles, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the current state and requirements for a VS Appliances service website, including removing brand selection, fixing logo assets, enabling SEO files, and supporting admin management features. Lists known issues, image requirements, and existing feature definitions.
